Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to excellence and innovation. Given its unique features and the quality it embodies, I believe it would significantly enhance the value of your collection or operations. I am extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $9500. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this investment that could potentially bring substantial benefits to you. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
